title: Two days still no response.....PLEASE HELP
body:
I have had a random problem and have not been able to fix it

Everytime after the champ select screen tries to load into the acual game league stops working and nothing more happens. ive tried repairing, uninstalled, reinstalled and still nothing is working and i KEEP GETTING LEAVERS ON MY GAMES WHICH ISNT RIGHT THEY ARE RANKED MATCHES. I would really appreciate some help or at least some one acknowledging my problem. Three games ive gotten leaver and lost rank for no reason, i dont have a history of leaving games so this is obvioulsy some crazy error. PLEASE HELP

replies.body:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/NAXe6XfY-i-may-have-figured-out-the-crashing-problem-guys

Try this, hope it works for ya !

Have you recently updated Windows?  There's an issue where the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) is auto-enabling and causing problems with league such as freezing and weird buzzing noises.  If this is the case for you, disabling it should fix this up!  If not, let me know with more details about what you're seeing exactly or any error messages.  Let me nkow!
